sentences.en: a dark man with striking features
sentences.cn: 相貌出众、肤色黝黑的男子

sentences.en: a striking contrast between wealth and poverty
A survey of 57 hospitals by Newchurch, a consultancy, reveals striking improvements.
sentences.cn: 一家名为纽彻奇的咨询公司对57家医院所作的调查显示改善十分明显。

sentences.en: Blonde and slender, she was too striking to escape their attention.
sentences.cn: 金发细腰的她太引人注目了，他们很难不注意到她。

sentences.en: He bears a striking resemblance to Lenin.
His youthfulness was as striking as hers.
I believe we are within striking distance of an agreement.
sentences.cn: 我相信我们即将达成协议。

sentences.en: She bears a striking resemblance to her older sister.
She is a very striking young woman.
sentences.cn: 她是一位非常引人注目的年轻女子.

sentences.en: She was very striking but in some way I felt repelled.
sentences.cn: 她非常引人注目，但我觉得她有些讨厌。

sentences.en: That spokesman is striking up the same old tune.
sentences.cn: 那个发言人又在老调重弹.

sentences.en: The actor, striking an attitude, began to quote Shakespeare.
sentences.cn: 这位演员装腔作势地开始引用莎士比亚的原文.

sentences.en: The clock began to whirr before striking the hour.
sentences.cn: 钟在打点前先嘎啦嘎啦地响起来。

sentences.en: The clock striking the hour pierced through his thoughts.
sentences.cn: 时钟的报时把他从沉思中惊醒。

sentences.en: The most striking feature of those statistics is the high proportion of suicides.
sentences.cn: 那些统计数据最显著的特征是高自杀率。

sentences.en: There is a striking difference between Jane and Mary.
sentences.cn: 简和玛丽之间有显著的差异.

sentences.en: This is an ambitious and intriguing movie, full of striking imagery.
sentences.cn: 这是一部气势恢宏、引人入胜的电影，充满了动人心魄的瑰丽意象。

sentences.en: What is immediately striking is how resourceful the children are.
sentences.cn: 最令人注目的是孩子们的机智聪明.

words.tran_cn: 因罢工而停顿的，因罢工而歇业的
显著地；突出地，引人注目地
罢工者；打击者；[军] 撞针；钟锤；叉鱼的人
罢工，打，打击（strike的过去式和过去分词）
打，打击；罢工；敲，敲击；抓；打动；穿透
打，击；罢工；撞击，冲击；侵袭；打动；到达

trans.tran_cn: 显著的，引人注目的，容貌出众的，妩媚动人的
trans.tran_en: unusual or interesting enough to be easily noticed

trans.tran_cn: 打( strike的现在分词)，击，敲响，报时
